attributes.action: Allow students on a Tier 4 visa to remain in the UK after visa expiry: COVID-19
attributes.background: HM government and the Home Office to make provisions to allow current Tier 4 Student Visa holders to remain in the UK post visa - to prevent situations where students are removed from the UK and rejected entry from their home country because of travel restrictions due to COVID-19.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced an extension for those unable to travel home. You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/visas-extended-for-those-currently-unable-to-return-home-due-to-covid-19

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
